text: Christopher J. Malloy is an American economist currently the Sylvan C. Coleman Professor of Financial Management at Harvard Business School. ==Education== *PhD in Finance and MBA from The University of Chicago Graduate School of Business *BA in Economics from Yale University ==References== Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:American economists Category:Harvard Business School faculty Category:University of Chicago Booth School of Business alumni Category:Yale University alumni
title: Christopher J. Malloy
